Comments_List: As with any graduate topics class, the material moves quickly and often is very specialized (thus difficult to find references). I think if the class had had more regular(incremental) written assignments I might have been a bit less lost. But the subject is very rich and Prof. Minsky brings it to life.

This was a fascinating and beautiful class. The story of hyperbolic 3-manifolds and Kleinian groups is deep and cool. Professor Minsky is a fantastic professor, and he really makes geometry beautiful.
Hyperbolic geometry! Minskys classes are always a blast. Take a class with manifolds (complex II, probably) and have a basic idea of topology before this one, if you are an undergrad.
